services.title: Mechanical sliders
services.text: For simpler moulded parts or if the complexity of the part allows it.
services.text2: Mechanical slide valves are simpler in design and often more cost-effective. They are well suited to applications where the movement of the sliding elements is less complex.
services.text3: Example: Housing parts for electronic devices that do not require complex movements of the sliding elements.

services.title: Hydraulic sliders
services.text: For complex moulded parts with different directions of movement or when precise control of the sliding elements is required.
services.text2: Hydraulic slides offer precise and controlled movement, which is particularly important when complex moulded parts are to be produced.
services.text3: Examples: Toys with moving parts where the sliding elements need to be controlled precisely.
